alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:09PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND WESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES... At 509 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Yellow Bear Canyon to near Wolf Creek Housing, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Yellow Bear Canyon around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Allen, Swett, Wakpamni, Martin, LaCreek North Housing and Sunrise Housing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
